text:
Imperva/Prevoty | Redwood Shores, CA or Los Angeles, CA | Software Engineer | Full-time, permanent | https://www.prevoty.com/ https://www.imperva.com/

Prevoty is looking for a talented Senior Software Engineers to join our Java team. As a Senior Software Engineer, you will play a central role in the design and development of our Java products. The ideal candidate will have a passion for development, a drive to fully understand the inner workings of each of the technologies they utilize, and a strong background in Java profiling and instrumentation.

Prevoty/Imperva in LA and SF are hiring for several roles for pur Java Team and/or QA Team. Here are a couple links to the postings -

http://app.jobvite.com/m?3560fkwf http://app.jobvite.com/m?3h60fkwr http://app.jobvite.com/m?3360fkwd

If interested here is the careers site - https://www.prevoty.com/about/careers

Keywords - JAVA REMOTE VISA
